content: कृत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [कृ-क्त] Done, performed, made, effected, accomplished, manufactured &c.; ({%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} of कृ {c8c} <ab>U.</ab> <ab>q. v.</ab>). --तं {@--1@} Work, deed, action; कृतं न वेत्ति <ls>Pt. 1. 424</ls> ungrateful; <ls>Ms. 7. 197.</ls> {@--2@} Service, benefit. {@--3@} Consequence, result. {@--4@} Aim, object. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of that side of a die which is marked with four points. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of the first of the four Yugas of the world extending over 1728000 years of men; (see <ls>Ms. 1. 69</ls> and <ls>Kull.</ls> thereon); but, according to <ls>Mb.</ls>, over 4800 years of men. {@--7@} The number ‘4’. {@--8@} A stake at a game. {@--9@} Prize or booty gained in a battle. {@--10@} An offering.

कृतं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Enough, no more of, away; (with <ab>instr.</ab>); अथवा कृतं संदेहेन <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; अथवा गिरा कृतं <ls>R. 11. 41</ls>; कृतमविष्कृतपौरुषैर्भुजैः <ls>Ki. 2. 17</ls>; कृतमश्वेन <ls>U. 4.</ls>
